mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO , P.NAME AS p_name , P.PRICE , P.IMAGE , P.DEL_YN , R.RATING , P.ENROLL_DATE FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN ORDERS_LIST OL ON P.PRODUCT_NO = OL.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN REVIEW R ON OL.ORDER_LIST_NO = R.ORDER_LIST_NO WHERE P.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY P.ENROLL_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO , P.NAME AS p_name , P.PRICE , P.IMAGE , P.DEL_YN , R.RATING , P.ENROLL_DATE FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN ORDERS_LIST OL ON P.PRODUCT_NO = OL.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN REVIEW R ON OL.ORDER_LIST_NO = R.ORDER_LIST_NO WHERE P.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY R.RATING DESC, P.NAME ASC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO , P.NAME as p_name , T.TYPE_NO , P.PRICE , P.DEL_YN , P.IMAGE , R.RATING , P.ENROLL_DATE FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN ORDERS_LIST OL ON P.PRODUCT_NO = OL.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN REVIEW R ON OL.ORDER_LIST_NO = R.ORDER_LIST_NO LEFT JOIN TYPE T ON P.TYPE_NO = T.TYPE_NO WHERE P.TYPE_NO = #{typeNo} AND P.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY P.ENROLL_DATE DESC

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO , P.TYPE_NO , P.NAME AS P_NAME , T.NAME as T_NAME , P.PRICE , P.DEGREE , P.CAPACITY , P.EXPIRY_DATE , P.IMAGE , P.STORAGE , TO_CHAR(P.ENROLL_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE , P.TASTE , P.APPETIZER , P.DEL_YN , R.RATING FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN ORDERS_LIST OL ON P.PRODUCT_NO = OL.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN REVIEW R ON OL.ORDER_LIST_NO = R.ORDER_LIST_NO LEFT JOIN TYPE T ON P.TYPE_NO = T.TYPE_NO WHERE P.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} AND P.DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO , P.NAME AS P_NAME , P.PRICE , P.IMAGE , P.DEL_YN , R.RATING FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN ORDERS_LIST OL ON P.PRODUCT_NO = OL.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN REVIEW R ON OL.ORDER_LIST_NO = R.ORDER_LIST_NO
AND P.NAME LIKE '%' || #{pName} || '%'
ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC OFFSET #{pageNo} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO , P.NAME AS P_NAME , P.PRICE , P.IMAGE , P.DEL_YN , R.RATING FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN ORDERS_LIST OL ON P.PRODUCT_NO = OL.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN REVIEW R ON OL.ORDER_LIST_NO = R.ORDER_LIST_NO
AND P.NAME LIKE '%' || #{pName} || '%'
ORDER BY PRODUCT_NO DESC
